snippet.title: Gate Guardian | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2975040/Gate_Guardian/

Gate Guardian is a fantasy roguelite in the tower defense genre.
Created by Dmitriy Zakharov & Andrey Zakharov

Take advantage of unimaginable freedom in creating your magic spells.
Build perfect combinations of skills, change and modify them.
Defend Life and Survive Death!

#GateGuardian #roguelite #towerdefense
